medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Height began to decline from her growth curve after age 2 years, with a subsequent reduction in weight gain. Growth velocity has fluctuated but most recently has been consistent with a normal delayed tempo of growth pattern. Current growth rate is at 4.83 cm/y, within the normal range for her age.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Has migraine headaches, takes no medications, and has no allergies. Normal results in evaluations for systemic illnesses, with negative screening for celiac disease and inflammatory bowel disease. Bone age is delayed.
medical_history.family_history: Family history includes diabetes, hypothyroidism, hypertension, and hyperlipidemia in her grandparents. Parents have heights of 157 cm (mother) and 168 cm (father) and report no significant health issues.
medical_history.social_history: She is physically active, participates in sports, and does well in school. Previous complaints of bullying due to her short stature have been noted.
